item.title: The Minister inspects ongoing airport work in Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[Minister for Minor Irrigation and Science and Technology N.S. Boseraju inspected the ongoing airport project on the outskirts of Raichur (Yaramaras village) in Raichur district on Saturday.
The airport project is under way. He inspected the building of the flight terminal, electricity safety, the runway, and other works.
The Minister said that there is no dearth in grants for the completion of the project. The construction of the compound wall surrounding the airport areas is almost completed....]]>
item.author: Authors

item.title: National-level post graduation research conference to be held at UAS Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[A two-day national post graduation research conference will be held on September 23 and 24 on the campus of the University of Agriculture Science (UAS) in Raichur.
In a release on Saturday, Gururaj Sunkad, dean of post graduation and organising secretary of the conference, said that the directorate of post graduation organised the conference aiming to develop confidence along with research knowledge, communication, and presentation skills in students.
The conference will also help to exchange ...]]>
